Deprecated API

Contents

  • Deprecated Classes
  • Deprecated Fields
  • Deprecated Methods
  • Deprecated Constructors
  • Deprecated Classes 
    Class and Description
    com.badlogic.gdx.graphics.g3d.environment.DirectionalShadowLight
    Experimental, likely to change, do not use!
  • Deprecated Fields 
    Field and Description
    com.badlogic.gdx.graphics.g3d.shaders.DefaultShader.defaultCullFace
    Replaced by DefaultShader.Config.defaultCullFace Set to 0 to disable culling
    com.badlogic.gdx.graphics.g3d.shaders.DefaultShader.defaultDepthFunc
    Replaced by DefaultShader.Config.defaultDepthFunc Set to 0 to disable depth test
    com.badlogic.gdx.graphics.g3d.Environment.shadowMap
    Experimental, likely to change, do not use!
  • Deprecated Methods 
    Method and Description
    com.badlogic.gdx.scenes.scene2d.ui.Container.addActor(Actor)
    Container may have only a single child.
    com.badlogic.gdx.scenes.scene2d.ui.ScrollPane.addActor(Actor)
    ScrollPane may have only a single child.
    com.badlogic.gdx.scenes.scene2d.ui.Container.addActorAfter(Actor, Actor)
    Container may have only a single child.
    com.badlogic.gdx.scenes.scene2d.ui.ScrollPane.addActorAfter(Actor, Actor)
    ScrollPane may have only a single child.
    com.badlogic.gdx.scenes.scene2d.ui.Container.addActorAt(int, Actor)
    Container may have only a single child.
    com.badlogic.gdx.scenes.scene2d.ui.ScrollPane.addActorAt(int, Actor)
    ScrollPane may have only a single child.
    com.badlogic.gdx.scenes.scene2d.ui.Container.addActorBefore(Actor, Actor)
    Container may have only a single child.
    com.badlogic.gdx.scenes.scene2d.ui.ScrollPane.addActorBefore(Actor, Actor)
    ScrollPane may have only a single child.
    com.badlogic.gdx.graphics.GL30.glVertexAttribPointer(int, int, int, boolean, int, Buffer)
    com.badlogic.gdx.utils.JsonValue.size()
    Use the size property instead. Returns this number of children in the array or object.
  • Deprecated Constructors 
    Constructor and Description

    Experimental, likely to change, do not use!
